PyStar: Programming Workshops for Women and Their Friends

next | index

Welcome to PyStar!¶

The PyStar program is workshop designed to teach all women (including trans women) and their friends who are looking to learn how to program in a friendly non-alpha geek environment.

PyStar Minneapolis¶

The Minneapolis PyStar is March 25th (6 - 8pm) and 26th (9am - 4pm) 2011 at Clockwork Active Media Systems:

1501 East Hennepin Avenue Minneapolis, MN 55414

Register here: http://pystar-mpls-1.eventbrite.com/

PyStar SanFrancisco¶

Tentative Dates: Friday April 22nd (6 - 8pm) and Saturday April 23rd (9am - 4pm) at the Mozilla office in Mountain View

650 Castro St, Suite 300 Mountain View, CA 94043

Please check back for confirmation and event registration
